component.name: Python DHCP Server
component.summary: Serve and inspect IP addresses in the local network

description.p: This DHCP server program will assign IP addresses ten seconds after it received packets from clients. So it can be used in networks that already have a dhcp server running. For most (WIFI) networks, it will just show what is happening and not interfere.

ul.li: lists IP address, Mac address and host name
assigns IP addresses 10 seconds later than usual DHCP servers
remembers addresses in the hosts.csv file.
can be configured to serve all DHCP options using Python
